name: .NBF File Extension
summary: Learn about .NBF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Archive of files backed up with NTI Backup Now; contains copies of folders and files that can be restored if the original files are damaged or deleted; typically named "backup_001.nbf," "backup_002.nbf," etc.

content: To restore files with Backup Now, use the "Restore" option within the View panel.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
